channel.title: Need working ::giveitem command

item.title: Need working ::giveitem command
item.dc:creator: @jockedaman jockedaman
item.description:
@jockedaman wrote:

that’s becuase u cant use the same class in the same command,but just take away the last sendmessage command and u should be fine.

item.title: Need working ::giveitem command
item.dc:creator: @startcode startcode
item.description:
@startcode wrote:

i get an error it says’ p2 is already defined’ what do i do now?
but i modified that code little bit i want to make it like this:
if (cmd[0].equals(“givesanta”) && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase(“owner”)) {
String victim = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1));
Player p2 = Server.engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(victim)];
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p2, 1050, 1);
p2.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “owner gave you a santa hat!”);

but then it says p2 is already defined what do i do now?

Read full topic

item.title: Need working ::giveitem command
item.dc:creator: @King_Joe King Joe
item.description:
@King_Joe wrote:

}
if (cmd[0].equals(“awarrior”) && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase(“Joseph”)) {
String victim = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1));
Player p2 = Server.engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(victim)];
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p2, 1042, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p2, 13890, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p2, 13896, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p2, 13902, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p2, 13870, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p2, 13873, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p2, 13873, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p2, 13876, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p2, 13887, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p2, 13893, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p2, 13899, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p2, 13905, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p2, 13858, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p2, 13861, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p2, 13864, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p2, 13867, 1);
p2.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “Joseph gave you Ancient warrior armour!”);

That will work for 508-525, just edit it to your name, items, and amount
